name: Truf Card Games
description:
TRUF Card Games or commonly known as Kartu TRUF or Trump are one of the top 10 card games with playing card that popular like rummy (remi), blackjack, poker, gaple, cangkulan, solitaire, bridge, bid whist, etc.

The TRUF Card Games application for Android is the first in Indonesia or maybe in the world. Currently it is still in the stage of ongoing development. Excellent features:

1. First Android Game Card Truf
2. Offline
3. Bid Rules (Bid with 2 cards)
4. Smart AI Player
5. Stunning visual graphics
6. FREE
7. Auto Bid


Let's support TRUF card games by downloading, 5 star rating, and nice comments.
Thank you
